TEXT: A wooden staff. NL No one has ever seen its controller. Maybe it's alive?
NL You summoned a bolt of lightning。

NL Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~“Join us Staff, and feel the warmth of the Spire.”~
